alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 05 at 2:16AM MST until March 05 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 6 PM MST TODAY FOR THE NORTHEAST AND EAST CENTRAL PLAINS, NORTHEAST AND CENTRAL HIGHLANDS DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND ABOVE NORMAL TEMPERATURES... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM MONDAY FOR THE CENTRAL HIGHLANDS, NORTHEAST HIGHLANDS AND NORTHEAST PLAINS OF NEW MEXICO DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND ABOVE NORMAL TEMPERATURES... .Southwest to west winds strengthen today with humidities lowering to less than 15 percent while temperatures will be about 5 to 15 degrees warmer than normal. Winds will not be quite as strong on Monday, but still sufficient for a critical fire weather conditions across much of northeast New Mexico and the Central Highlands. Several hours of single digit humidity values and above average temperatures are also expected. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM MST MONDAY... The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a Red Flag Warning...which is in effect from 10 AM to 6 PM MST Monday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AREA AND TIMING...Red Flag Warning in effect for Northeast Plains (Zone 104), Northeast Highlands (Zone 123), and Central Highlands (Zone 125) from late this morning through this afternoon and again from mid morning Monday through Monday afternoon. * 20 FOOT WINDS...Southwest to west 25 to 40 mph with gusts to around 55 mph today and southwest to west at 20 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph on Monday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Ranging from around 6 to 13 percent today and 5 to 10 percent on Monday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains
